name: Jewel Legends: Magical Kingdom
description:
Restore the magic kingdom to its former glory in this jewel-swapping adventure! Collect precious jewels by forming rows of 3 or more jewels. Build beautiful buildings and the magnificent castle and be the Magical Kingdom’s savior!

Once the people of the Magical Kingdom lived in contentment and prosperity, but then the army of the Black Sorcerer took everything from them and destroyed the kingdom. The Black Sorcerer has been defeated, but everything lies in ashes. Now it is your task to rebuild the Magical Kingdom!

Note this is a trial version with an in game unlock.

***Full Unlocked Version Features***
- 140 levels and 8 magical tools
- Build marvelous structures such as the Crystal Forge, the Mage Tower and the magnificent castle
- 3 game modes: Adventure, Tournament and Freeplay – plus challenging mini-games!

Download and play today!
